price: [O people], your god is only Allah; none has the right to be worshiped except Him. He encompasses everything in knowledge.”
arabic: إِنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عِلۡمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innamā ilāhukumu al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa wasiʿa kulla shayin ʿil'man
